level.text: Each aide or volunteer in a Child Development Center shall work under the direct supervision of a teacher, assistant teacher, group leader, assistant group leader, or Center Director at all times.
The duties of each aide or volunteer in a center shall include the following:
Assisting the teacher, assistant teacher, group leader, assistant group leader, and/or Center Director as directed;

Providing supervision and appropriate care to the children in his or her assigned class or group, under the direct supervision of a teacher, assistant teacher, group leader, assistant group leader, or Center Director; and
Attending in-service training programs and completing continuing education requirements, as required.
The Facility shall ensure that no aide or volunteer has sole responsibility for a group or classroom, or for the Center, at any time.
